page.title: 08MORETON COMMUNITY ASSOC. (2)
page.content:
We talked to pensioners who attended the Luncheon Club each Wednesday. They were appreciative of the service as it allowed them to buy a good meal at a low cost and make many new friends. We also visited the Playgroup which caters for children aged 2-5 and about 25 children attend each day. They enjoy various pre-school learning activities and playing on slides and climbing frames.
Future plans for the Centre are to improve the present services and to help those in the Community who cannot easily get to the Centre at present. A shopping service for the infirm and disabled has already been initiated and a handyman and hairdressing service will start soon. The first edition of their magazine was published in June l985.
